movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets tries a final job.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: A family of four infiltrates the lives of a wealthy family.

movies.title: The Intouchables
movies.description: An unexpected friendship develops between a quadriplegic aristocrat and his caregiver.

movies.title: Journey to Arcadia
movies.description: An epic quest to the mysterious land of Arcadia, where heroes face ancient challenges.

movies.title: Cyber Dreams
movies.description: Set in a dystopian future where technology reigns supreme, a lone hacker tries to break free.

movies.title: Moonlight Sonata
movies.description: Two souls intertwined by fate, dance under the moonlight, rediscovering love.

movies.title: King's Legacy
movies.description: The tale of a young prince's ascent to the throne amidst political turmoil.

movies.title: Guardians of the Abyss
movies.description: A team of explorers venture deep into the world's deepest oceans, only to discover a world they never knew existed.

movies.title: Desert Mirage
movies.description: In the heart of the desert, a detective is drawn into a case of disappearances and mirages that blur reality and illusion.

movies.title: Winter's Embrace
movies.description: A family drama set against the backdrop of a harsh Canadian winter, testing the bonds of love and trust.

movies.title: Flight of the Phoenix
movies.description: After the world is consumed by darkness, a young mage embarks on a journey to find the mythical Phoenix to bring back the light.

movies.title: Echoes from the Past
movies.description: A historian's obsession with an ancient relic awakens spirits seeking revenge.

movies.title: Starship Nebula
movies.description: Spacefarers find themselves in a race against time to save their ship and crew from an unknown alien entity in the vastness of space.

movies.title: The Last Ballad
movies.description: A talented musician's life and love are chronicled through the songs he writes in the romantic streets of Paris.

movies.title: Silent Whispers
movies.description: When a group of friends visit an old mansion, they soon realize the whispers they hear are not just their imagination.

movies.title: The Golden Heist
movies.description: A master thief assembles a team to pull off the heist of the century in Spain's most guarded vault.

movies.title: Legends of Avalon
movies.description: Knights, dragons, and magic. Dive into the legends of King Arthur and the mystical island of Avalon.
